          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'Escola a casa. Ara sortim! / Les abelles (Granja Escola Les Obagues de Juneda)</string>
            <string language="en">"School at home". "An outing!" Bees (Les Obagues de Juneda Educational Farm)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"Schule zu Hause". "ein Outing!" 
Bienen (Les Obagues de Juneda Educational Bauernhof)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"école à la maison". "une promenade!" 
Abeilles (ferme de Les Obagues de Juneda Educational)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"escola na HOME". "um outing!" 
Abelhas (fazenda de Les Obagues de Juneda Educacional)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"scuola nel paese". "un outing!" Api 
(podere del Les Obagues de Juneda Educational)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Σχολείο στο σπίτι". "Μια έξοδος!" 
Μέλισσες (εκπαιδευτικό αγρόκτημα Les Obagues de 
juneda)</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">La Granja Escola de les Obagues permet als nois i noies observar la vida i les activitats de les abelles en un entorn natural.</string>
            <string language="en">Obagues Educational Farm gives children the opportunity to observe the life and activities of bees in a natural environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">explotació agrària</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">school activities</string>
            <string language="es">actividades escolares</string>

            <string language="ca">Activitats extraescolars i àrees transversals del currículum</string>

            <string language="es">Activitates fuera de programa y transversales</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Obagues pädagogischer Bauernhof gibt Kindern die
Gelegenheit, das Leben und die Aktivitäten der Bienen in einer 
natürlichen Umgebung zu beobachten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La ferme éducative d'Obagues donne à des 
enfants l'occasion d'observer la vie et les activités des abeilles 
dans un environnement normal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fazenda educacional de Obagues dá a crianças 
a oportunidade de observar a vida e as atividades das abelhas em um 
ambiente natural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il podere educativo di Obagues dà a bambini 
l'occasione osservare la vita e le attività delle api in un ambiente 
naturale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εκπαιδευτικό αγρόκτημα Obagues δίνει στα παιδιά 
την ευκαιρία να παρατηρήσει τη ζωή και τις δραστηριότητες των 
μελισσών σε ένα φυσικό περιβάλλον.</string>
          </description>
